author: Erica Euse, Nicole DeMarco
title: How Asian Americans are fighting against coronavirus racism
description: Young people are speaking out about how hate is impacting their communities and overall well-being in light of the COVID-19 pandemic.
content: June Kitahara and Sarah Dinh. After watching videos of random, innocent Asian Americans being attacked due to the rise of the coronavirus and the rise of xenophobia, Ive learned to be scared of who I am, William Diep says straight-to-camera in a video testimo… [+6897 chars]
